text.tspan: Helper method eliminates duplicate error handling
Reuses helper method for consistent error handling

svg.text: store readTimeout parameter for connection handling
logger.Warn("Failed to set read deadline", "error", err, "context", "initial")
spawn graceful shutdown goroutine for connection
logger.Warn("Failed to set read deadline", "error", err, "context", "reset")
trim spaces and ignore empty entries
context.WithTimeout(shutdownTimeoutFlag) - create shutdown context with configurable timeout
cancel context - signal all connections to stop
wg.Wait() - wait for all connections to complete
